text: @ACTBrigitte Hey Lady Gaga, guess how long it took for @WHO to declare COVID-19 a pandemic?  I'll give you a hint - most of us were calling it a pandemic long before WHO was.

entity.name: One World: Together at Home
entity.description: Global Citizen presents One World: Together at Home, a global special curated in collaboration with Lady Gaga and featuring your favorite artists and comedians — all in support of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the health care workers on the frontlines of the COVID-19 crisis⁠.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
